children.text:
For each test case, the first line contains a single integer $$$n$$$ ($$$2 \leq n \leq 100$$$) — the length of the sequence $$$a$$$.

Output Specification:
children.label: code_analysis

children.text: For each test case, print a single integer — the minimum number of operations to change all numbers in the sequence to zero.
